options.content: *This dashboard displays federated views of all members of clusters.*

panels.description: Number of entries owned on this member
panels.title: Replicated Maps: Entries

panels.description: Memory cost of owned entries on this member

panels.description: Number of events received on this member

panels.description: Total number of operations on this member
panels.title: Replicated Maps: Total Operations

panels.title: Replicated Maps: Put Count

panels.description: Number of get operations on this member
panels.title: Replicated Maps: Get Count

panels.description: Number of remove operations on this member
panels.title: Replicated Maps: Remove Count
